article_title: Democrats Create And Benefit From Economic Weakness

article_metadata.description: Democratic Party economic policy has been a dismal failure at creating economic growth. That does not mean it has been a completely failure, however, as Democrats stand to gain electorally from a weak economy.
article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman
